coloring noun
(SKIN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the combined effect of the colors of a person’s skin and hair: He claimed that when people don’t get enough protein in their food, their coloring isn’t so good.
coloring noun
(APPEARANCE)
[ C ] a substance added to food or drink to change its color artificially: The label says that no preservatives or artificial colorings were added to this cake.
